text:
When Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal were dating, they always seemed to be on the go.

The Oscar-winning actor and Sports Illustrated swimsuit model captured headlines — and photographers' lenses — with their glamorous, globe-trotting romance. Though their getaways spanned posh locales like Ibiza, St. Bart's and the Bahamas, DiCaprio and Agdal mostly kept their relationship out of the spotlight.

After a year together, DiCaprio and Agdal split in 2017. A source told PEOPLE at the time that their breakup was "amicable."

From blissful vacations to PDA-filled nights out, here's a look back at Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal's relationship.

May 24, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal party together in N.Y.C.

DiCaprio and Agdal were first spotted together in May at Up & Down club in N.Y.C. The actor arrived at the nightclub with Agdal and a group of friends, before partying the night away in the VIP section.

June 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal spend a weekend together in Montauk, New York

AKM-GSI

The next month, DiCaprio and Agdal were spotted together on a weekend getaway in Montauk, New York, though a source told PEOPLE the two were "not dating." During the trip, DiCaprio and Agdal were seen enjoying a few local hot spots together, including picking up breakfast at Goldberg's Famous Bagels. They also visited the Montauk Point Lighthouse, according to Page Six.

July 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal vacation together in the Bahamas

The Revenant star and the supermodel were merely a "fast fling" as of July,a source told PEOPLE after the duo vacationed together with friends on the private Bahamian island Over Yonder Cay.

July 14, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal have a beach day in Malibu

Later that month, DiCaprio was photographed locking lips with Agdal as they lounged in the sand during a romantic beach day in Malibu, California.

"It was just the two of them at the beach," a source told PEOPLE at the time. "They enjoyed the beach and had fun swimming. They also took a kayak out in the ocean."

July 24, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal party on a yacht in Ibiza, Spain

Near the end of July, DiCaprio and Agdal werespotted eating in a restaurant and partying on a yacht in Ibiza, Spain, with DiCaprio's longtime pal Tobey Maguire and more friends.

August 21, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal are involved in a car accident in the Hamptons

Jackson Lee/Splash News Online

DiCaprio and Agdal wereinvolved in a car accident in late August. Luckily, though an ambulance was called to the scene the Hamptons crash was minor. A source quickly confirmed to PEOPLE that both were "doing great" following the fender-bender.

September 29, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal have dinner in N.Y.C.

After lying low for a few weeks, DiCaprio and Agdal were spotted on a romantic date at Gotham Bar and Grill in New York City's Greenwich Village – and a source told PEOPLE that they couldn't keep their hands off each other.

The insider said that the two dined at the restaurant with a small group around 9:30 p.m. and were seen "canoodling" at their table. "They were kissing," the source revealed. "Like, right out in the open at the table."

October 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal get "more serious"﻿

By October, a source told PEOPLE that DiCaprio and Agdal seemed "more serious."

"Leo seems very into her," the source said. "He constantly holds her hand and kisses her. Nina seems to enjoy Leo's company too. She acts very giddy around him. She has great energy and seems to make Leo very happy."

The source added, "Whenever they spend time together, Leo acts very happy. For Leo, Nina seems like a breath of fresh air."

November 11, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio celebrates his birthday with Nina Agdal and his mother in French Polynesia

When DiCaprio turned 42 in November, Agdal was on hand for a special trip to French Polynesia with him and his mother, Irmelin Indenbirken, PEOPLE confirmed.

The group – which also included film producer Mike Medavoy and his wife – stayed at The Brando on Tetiaroa, reported Page Six.

November 23, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal have lunch together on Thanksgiving Eve

Later in November, DiCaprio and Agdal were seen spendingThanksgiving Eve together in Charleston, South Carolina.

The pair enjoyed lunch at popular eatery Butcher & Bee and then were seen walking through downtown Charleston together.

December 13, 2016: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal hit the beach in Cancun

Nina Agdal Instagram

The jet-setting duofled to warmer weather once again in the final month of 2016, traveling to Cancun with Lukas Haas and a mystery brunette.

January 8, 2017: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal attend a Golden Globes afterparty together

DiCaprio and Agdalreunited at Jimmy Fallon's private Golden Globes afterparty at L.A. hot spot Delilah in January – and weren't shy about PDA.

"Leo was in a booth next to the deejay and basically gazing longingly into Nina's eyes," a partygoer told PEOPLE. "At one point, she leaned into him for a cuddle. They were very relaxed together."

February 26, 2017: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal attend Madonna's Oscar afterparty

Kevin Winter/Getty

Though DiCaprio flew solo at the Oscars on Feb. 26, he didmeet up with his girlfriend at one of Hollywood's exclusive afterparties later that night: a private bash hosted by Madonna and her manager.

A source told PEOPLE at the time that DiCaprio and Agdal were closer than ever.

March 26, 2017: Nina Agdal celebrates her birthday with Leonardo DiCaprio in St. Bart's

AKM-GSI; Inset: Gregg DeGuire/WireImage

Agdal jetted off with DiCaprio to St. Bart's to celebrate her 25th birthday. There, they met up with Orlando Bloom and a group of friends including tech mogul Jim Clark's model wife, Kristy Hinze-Clark.

The group spent time together on Clark's yacht. "They are having fun," an insider told PEOPLE.

March 29, 2017: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal attend a concert together in N.Y.C.

Just days after their St. Bart's getaway, DiCaprio and Agdal attended an exclusive showcase for the Australian band Chase Atlantic at the Ludlow House in N.Y.C. The couple was joined at the concert by the actor's longtime friend, rapper Q-Tip.

"He was low-key but sweet. They hugged around the bar," a source told PEOPLE of DiCaprio and Agdal. "He made sure she had a seat."

April 28, 2017: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal are spotted kissing in N.Y.C.

A month later, DiCaprio and Agdal were spotted kissing by the Hudson River in downtown Manhattan.

"It was a really sweet moment," an onlooker told PEOPLE, adding, "Nina put her arms around his neck and kissed him."

May 9, 2017: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal have sushi in West Hollywood

For what was presumably one of the final dates for the couple, DiCaprio and Agdal were spotted at a sushi restaurant in West Hollywood, California.

May 18, 2017: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal break up

After one year of dating, DiCaprio and Agdal broke up. "They broke up a couple of days ago," a source told PEOPLE on May 18. "Nina and Leo have parted ways. It is amicable. They remain friends."

The same source revealed it was DiCaprio who broke things off. "He's not ready to settle down and just isn't in the mindset to get married or have kids," the source said.
authors: Lindsay Kimble Is The Director Of Newsroom Operations At People. She Have Been Working At People For Seven Years. Her Work Has Previously Appeared In Popsugar
title: Leonardo DiCaprio and Nina Agdal's Relationship: A Look Back
